title: Entertainment storytelling
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Cinematography
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Video recording - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Video tape recorders and recording
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Video tape recorders and recording
description: Episode number 15 of Series "Video tech". This program allows the viewer to consolidate what they have learned in the other episodes of the series and apply these to the production of an entertainment story. Follow the production of an actual story from the initial stages of choosing and developing an idea, researching the background, planning work which has to be done on the shoot, getting the shots needed for the story, shotlisting, and doing an interview through to post-production and the screening of the final product.
